item.title: Creating a GUI for a Trading Bot
item.description: The journey towards creating a light trading bot framework begins with a simple, intuitive graphical user interface (GUI). For this venture, I have chosen to rely on Python’s built-in Tkinter library to provide the fundamental building blocks for my GUI. Embracing Simplicity The initial goal is to keep the GUI as straightforward as possible, focusing on the core functionalities required for a trading bot. The main elements incorporated are: Start/Stop Buttons: These allow the user to control the operation of the bot.
